description: Ahead of the weekend's Premier League and FA Cup football action, Sportsmail brings you the latest squad news, odds and stats on every top flight fixture.
title: Premier League and FA Cup team news, odds and stats
title_page: Premier League and FA Cup team news, odds and stats | Daily Mail Online
text:
Ahead of the weekend's action of Premier League and FA Cup football, Sportsmail brings you the latest squad news, odds and stats on every top flight fixture.
Simply click on your team in the fixture list below to find out who is ruled out and who is making a return as well as all the key statistics surrounding your club's fixture.
Find out the latest team news ahead of the weekend's Premier League fixtures
Saturday March 11
Bournemouth vs West Ham
Everton vs West Brom
Hull City vs Swansea
Middlesbrough vs Manchester City (FA Cup Sixth Round)
Arsenal vs Lincoln (FA Cup Sixth Round)
Sunday March 12
Liverpool vs Burnley
Tottenham vs Millwall (FA Cup Sixth Round)
Monday March 13
Chelsea vs Manchester United (FA Cup Sixth Round)
